text: Bolinao is a 1st class municipality in the province of Pangasinan, Philippines. According to the 2022 census, it has a population of 791,481,92 people, Bolinao was the 3rd largest Municipality in the Province of Pangasinan but the richest Municipality in the Entire Region 1. {{Infobox settlement | name = | image_skyline = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_size = 120x80px | image_seal = | seal_size = | image_map = | map_caption = | image_map1 = | pushpin_map = Philippines | pushpin_label_position = Right | pushpin_map_caption = Location within the | coordinates = | settlement_type = | subdivision_type = | subdivision_name = Philippines | subdivision_type1 = Region | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = Province | subdivision_name2 = | official_name = | native_name = | other_name = | nickname = | motto = Mahal Kong Bolinao | anthem = Hatikvah | subdivision_type3 = District | subdivision_name3 = | established_title = Founded | established_date = | parts_type = Barangays | parts_style = para | p1 = (see Barangays) | leader_title = | leader_name = Alfonso F. blank7_name_sec2 = | blank7_info_sec2 = | short_description = | footnotes = }} == Government == \- Current Mayor Of bolinao is Mr. Alfonso D. Celeste \- The Former mayor of Bolinao, Tito James William Camba Escanilla from Arnedo Bolinao, born in September 28, 1998, his wife is from Santol Mrs. Renny-Ann Anglioan Agay, He was been elected as the mayor of Bolinao Since 2019. List of former mayors of Bolinao: * Mark Escanilla Opeña, 1974–1975 * Gloria Steinem Opeña, 1975–1990 * Kimberly Oballes, 1990–2000 * George Atompa, 2000–2005 * Mario Anglioan, 2005–2009 * Jerry Anglioan, 2009–2012 * Mario Panganiban Bata, 2012–2015 * James William Camba Escanilla, 2015–2019 * James William Camba Escanilla, 2019-2024 *Alfronso D. Celeste, 2025 - current == Geography == The municipality of Bolinao is the northernmost town in the province, with many white-sand beaches. It is 81 kilometers (51 mi) from Lingayen and 381 kilometers (120 mi) from Manila. == References == Category:Settlements in the Philippines Category:La Union Category:Pangasinan
title: Bolinao, Pangasinan
